= Adding an IRC server =

{{{bash
/server add libera irc.libera.chat/6697 -ssl
}}}
>In this command libera is the internal server name used by WeeChat used when you are connecting [[#Connecting to an IRC server]]

For more info, run `help server`


= Connecting to an IRC server =

{{{bash
/connect libera
}}}


= Custom IRC server options =

== Nicknames ==

{{{bash
/set irc.server.libera.nicks "mynick,mynick2,mynick3,mynick4,mynick5"
}}}

== Set Real and Usernames ==

{{{bash
/set irc.server.libera.username "My user name"
/set irc.server.libera.realname "My real name"
}}}


= Joining / Parting from IRC channels =

{{{bash
/join #channel
/part [quit message]
}}}
>Join joins the channel
>Part keeps the buffer open

{{{bash
/close
/disconnect
}}}
>Close closes the buffer
>Disconnect from the irc server


= Searching irc networks =

{{{bash
/list
/list -re <regex>
}}}
